function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High concentration of covid-19 cases in a major wholesale market.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of alternative options to mitigate the transmission of the virus.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for post-pandemic behaviors in public spaces.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in following physical distancing norms in urban public spaces","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to enforce public norms and regulations in heavily dense urban areas","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact of shutting down public spaces in densely populated areas","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global pandemic of covid-19 causing daily loss of lives and economic downturn","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmissibility of sars-cov-2 variants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological aversion to big crowds and necessary changes in public spaces","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation and natural light may lead to high humidity, increasing the risk of viruses sticking and spreading easily.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inflexible layout design may lead to inadequate access to daylight and natural light, impacting the overall health and well-being of occupants.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient separation of wet and living spaces may lead to increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of pathogens.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of greenery near living and working areas may impact mental well-being and stress levels of occupants.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to green spaces in living areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and fresh air supply in unit apartments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for virus spread in home environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper daylight in work/study areas may lead to increased drowsiness and reduced productivity, impacting overall well-being.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Congestion of activities in the house due to lockdown regulations may lead to a reduction in privacy for family members, impacting mental health and well-being.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of separate sanitation facilities and buffer spaces may increase the risk of virus spread within the household.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to nature may impact the mental and physical health of occupants, especially during prolonged lockdown periods.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on natural ventilation may lead to inadequate air exchange, allowing viruses and particles to accumulate indoors.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High humidity levels in rooms may promote the growth of mold and mildew, leading to respiratory health issues.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow variability in the building may result in stagnant air and concentration of pollutants.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and airflow in apartment units","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to daylight and natural light","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of application of biophilic design principles","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for biophilic design in built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate covid-19 prevention measures in apartment units","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider the impact of spatial configuration on disease propagation","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for virus or bacteria to be brought into housing from external sources","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of good air circulation and natural ventilation in housing design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited mobility and regulation in a pandemic area","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate room quality in an apartment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of connection to nature, daylight, and fresh air in housing and residential areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited space and inadequate rooms in apartments making it uncomfortable for residents","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for virus spread in apartment sharing systems such as ducting, shafts, or corridors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to adjust apartment design to increase resilience towards covid-19 and improve resident comfort","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate utilization of technology for mitigating the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cybersecurity risk due to accelerated digital transformation","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective management and governance in dealing with contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated innovations in technologies may lead to security vulnerabilities in online platforms and digital systems, increasing the risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telehealth technologies and platforms may lead to accessibility issues for individuals with limited digital literacy or technological resources.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of robust testing for innovative technologies and solutions may lead to deployment of unproven or flawed systems, increasing the risk of technological failures and negative impact on public health and safety.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper communication leading to risk perception among the public and affecting societal response to the pandemic.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of surveillance technologies leading to unmonitored spread of the infection.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient use of supply chain technologies leading to shortages of essential healthcare products.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly modified healthcare facilities may lead to increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased power consumption after lockdown may lead to higher pollution levels and environmental health risks.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate coordination and compliance with public health measures may lead to greater transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness and education about preventive measures and accurate information","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"}]}
